string-array.name: sensitivity_label
string-array.item: Determines how many pixels are required to classify an app into certain color category. For example: maximum sensitivity will include colors into the blue filter, even if there are no many blue pixels. On the other hand, minimum sensitivity means that apps filtered by blue must have several blue pixels in order to to be taken into account

string-array.name: enable_app_color
string-array.item: Enables (a.k.a. being cool) or disables (a.k.a. not being cool) the whole app.

string-array.name: show_notification_icon
string-array.item: Removes or shows the icon from the status bar. It will always be shown in the notification area though.

string-array.name: active_area_position
string-array.item: Indicates which edge of the screen you must swipe from in order to launch App Color

string-array.name: active_area_gravity
string-array.item: By default, the active area is located at the center of the screen. Keep in mind that placing it in the bottom of the screen might interfere with the keyboard.

string-array.name: active_area_height_label
string-array.item: Determines how big is the active are

string-array.name: show_active_area
string-array.item: Shows/hides visible small handle in the active area

string-array.name: tap_to_select_color
string-array.item: If checked, you must click the filter to activate it. If not, it will be activated on touch, which means you can touch and drag to activate many filters in a single swipe.

string-array.name: refresh
string-array.item: This will scan all your apps and update the indices used to filter them by color. You must do this for the sensitivity changes to be reflected on the app behavior; or just for fun.

string-array.name: tutorial
string-array.item: Launches a tutorial with a nice, hypnotic, flat finger swinging around the screen. Launch this if you are bored or sad. It will make your day.

string-array.name: show_hidden_apps
string-array.item: This will allow you to show apps you hid previously; that way you can mark them as visible again.
